memberdef.name: LEARNQL_REGISTER_TYPE
memberdef.initializer: do { \ learnql::meta::TypeInfo info(#Type, sizeof(Type)); \ __VA_ARGS__ \ learnql::meta::TypeRegistry::instance().register_type<Type>(std::move(info)); \ learnql::meta::TypeRegistry::instance().register_type_by_name(#Type, info); \ } while(0)

briefdescription.para: Helper macro to register a type with its fields.

memberdef.name: LEARNQL_FIELD
memberdef.initializer: info.add_field(#FieldName, FieldType, offsetof(Type, FieldName), sizeof(Type::FieldName), IsPrimaryKey);

briefdescription.para: Helper macro to define a field in type registration.
